db:abstract.db:para: [with] With statements are strongly discouraged in QML.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [with] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: The JavaScript with statement was used.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: With statements might cause false positives when analysing unqualified identifiers. Also, with statements are marked as deprecated by the latest JavaScript standard.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, replace the with statement with a destructuring property:
